description: Service for a particular household at a food pantry
title: Service

___genderOtherCount.description: Count of other gender household members receiving service

___hispanicCount.description: Count of hispanic household members receiving service

___numberPoundsOther.description: Number of pounds of other services received

___updatedBy.description: [Output only] User to last modify the user role

___isSingleParentHousehold.description: Flag to indicate if a service was provided to a single parent household

___disabledCount.description: Count of disabled household members receiving service

___isInCityLimits.description: Flag to indicate if a service was provided to a household in city limits

___personPresentFirstName.description: First name of the person picking up the service items

___headOfHouseholdGender.description: Gender of the Head of Household

___specialNeedsCount.description: Count of special needs household members receiving service

___genderFemaleCount.description: Count of female gender household members receiving service

___genderMaleCount.description: Count of male gender household members receiving service

___numberPoundsFullService.description: Number of pounds of full service received

___serviceId.description: [Output Only] Unique ID of pantry household service

___createdAt.description: [Output only] Creation time of the user role

___numberPoundsBaby.description: Number of pounds of baby services received

___numberPoundsEFAP.description: Number of pounds of EFAP service received

___isHomeless.description: Flag to indicate if a service was provided to a homeless household

___updatedAt.description: [Output only] Last modification time of the user role

___transportationType.description: Type of transportation for the household

___createdBy.description: [Output only] Creator of the user role

___numberPoundsNonFood.description: Number of pounds of non-food service received

___numberPoundsSupplemental.description: Number of pounds of supplemental service received
